data.name: Wrestling Superstar "Kurt Angle" - Playable Character
data.detailed_description:
Wrestling Legend, Olympic Gold Medalist, WWE Hall of Famer is going from a gold medal to a green body as he delivers an Olympic slam to the competition as he joins the squad of "The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare"

Kurt Angle is best known for his time with World Wrestling Federation/World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) in the late 90s to more recent appearances and his time with Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) from 2006 to 2016.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
